about_the_game:
Hear her call! The Siren’s Song is a brand new DLC for Sker Ritual!

Captured and imprisoned on Sker Island years before the Siren’s Call can be heard for miles, entrancing all who listens.



The Siren’s Song DLC unlocks a new mask and exclusive items so you can torment all those who can’t help but hear the Siren’s Song.

Seek retribution from Sker Island and your captors with the hauntingly alluring Siren’s mask. Seek solace in your Bird’s Nest menu background. Entrance your friends and foes with the exclusive in-game Siren’s Call and display your allegiance to the Siren’s Song with the Siren Player Emblem.



This pack includes 4 new items:

Siren Mask


An Exclusive Premium Mask of the alluring Siren

Bird’s Nest


An Exclusive Premium Animated Menu Background of the Bird’s Nest

Siren’s Call


An Exclusive In-Game Voice Line to lure long lost sailors and friends to their maddening doom.

Siren Emblem


An Exclusive Siren Emblem Player Icon capture the attention of your prey

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8.1, 10 (64-bit required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
